Literature.Title: Additivity and synergy between an antimicrobial peptide and inhibitory ions.
Literature.Author: Walkenhorst WF, Sundrud JN, Laviolette JM

Literature.Title: Synthetic molecular evolution of host cell-compatible, antimicrobial peptides effective against drug-resistant, biofilm-forming bacteria.
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2020;117:8437-8448
Literature.Author: Starr CG, Ghimire J, Guha S, Wang Y, Hoffmann JP, Sun L, Landreneau BN, Kolansky ZD, Kilanowski-Doroh IM, Sammarco MC, Morici LA, Wimley WC

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:19% Hemolysis=100 µM,Human fibroblasts WI-38:50% Cell death=>200 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MSC=2.9±0.2µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MSC=2.2±0.2µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MSC=3.9±0.3µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MSC=1.8±0.06µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=1.7µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=22.9µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=26.0µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=>30µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=2.0µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=29.1µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=5.4µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=>30µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=9.9µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=>30µM),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 19434(MIC=3.1µM),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 19434(MIC=14.3µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=3.6µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>30µM)
